title: Love Thy Neighbor
description: Don’t fall for your roommate…especially when he’s your best friend.Cooper Bennett is my best friend.That’s all he is and all he ever will be.Nothing will change that.Accidentally seeing him naked? Please. So not a big deal.Having less-than-tame thoughts? I mean, have you seen this guy? Who could blame me?Kissing him? It was a one-time mistake, and it will not be repeated.Falling into bed with him? Uh-oh…It’s fine. We’re fine.We’re Caroline and Cooper. Best friends until the end. Nothing has ever come our way that we couldn’t survive together.Surely, we can handle this too…
author: Teagan Hunter
